notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: B.L. and H.W. carried out the experimental design. B.L. and X.G. carried out geo-database and model building, and data analysis. X.G., J.M., Z.J., and J.X. helped in data collection and data analysis. B.L. wrote the first draft of the manuscript. X.G. and H.W. reviewed the manuscript. All authors reviewed and accepted the final draft of the manuscript.
